alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 3:54AM PST until December 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of one quarter miles or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County, Greater Vancouver Area and South Washington Cascade Foothills. In Oregon, Lower Columbia and Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog likely will be the most dense and linger the longest in rural areas of Clark and Cowlitz County in Washington, and Washington County in Oregon.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Remember to drive slower and use extra care and courtesy on the commute to work this morning.

area.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia
